channel.title: [PI] cache help
channel.description: hey i have a webclient for my PI based server and it downloads the cache to the c:/ drive as normal, the problem is the cache is named of a different server. i have tried to change this but cannot figure out how to do it. i have changed the cache download link, i have changed the thing in signlink.java, still renames it to the other server in the c:/ drive if you can help or you think you know where about in my client this is located so i can change it that would be appreciated because i have spent over an hour trying to change this so far and it has not worked this is important also because i cannot update the cache and i just added stuff to it :eek:

item.title: [PI] cache help
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

This belongs in the Client Help section.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] cache help
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

hey i have a webclient for my PI based server and it downloads the cache to the c:/ drive as normal, the problem is the cache is named of a different server. i have tried to change this but cannot figure out how to do it. i have changed the cache download link, i have changed the thing in signlink.java, still renames it to the other server in the c:/ drive
if you can help or you think you know where about in my client this is located so i can change it that would be appreciated because i have spent over an hour trying to change this so far and it has not worked
this is important also because i cannot update the cache and i just added stuff to it :eek:

Read full topic
